title: Username taken?!?
body: I'm trying to make a new account but apparently the username is taken. I tried searching it up but it was never taken. Please help!

replies.body: Usernames are private to each account, so it's not something that would be visible to anyone but the account owner.  Once your account is created, you'll be able to login and select your Summoner Name, which is the name other players will see.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
